content: make your home look trendy with these really beautiful and fabulous storing baskets 1 perfect for any interior design and perfect for storing your personal items in your bathroom your office or in your living room the baskets are crocheted in the soft hobbii ribbon and a stylish leather strap adds a finishing touch to it happy crocheting **materials ** − crochet hook h 5 0mm - l 8 0 mm see the gauge section for more info − hobbii ribbon 75g small or 130g large − leather strap- ¾ x 2 ¼ natural large − leather strap ½ x 2 - natural small − 2 rivets − leather working punch **size ** *large* base= approx 7 ½ x 3 ¾ height= approx 3 ½ *small* base= approx 4 ½ x 2 ½ height= approx 2 ¾ **abbreviations ** **chain** chain stitch **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **long- single_crochet** long single_crochet- skip two previous row insert hook in single_crochet in next row pull up long lp yo draw through both lps on hook **bl** back loop **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **gauge ** the pattern is written for a crochet hook h 5 0 mm but the size can be adjusted by using a larger or smaller hook if the hook is too small the base of the basket will begin to curve forming a bowl shape in this case you should go up to a larger hook 1 https //hobbii com/product-patterns/hobbii-design/ribbon-basket-oval utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-kurve-ovale&utm_term=swr
